content:
Thank you so much for your help and guidance throughout our conversation! I really appreciate your encouragement and support. I'll definitely keep you updated on my progress and let you know if I have any more questions or need further assistance.

I'm feeling more confident and prepared to reach out to local IT companies now, and I'm excited to explore potential job shadowing or mentorship opportunities. Your advice and insights have been incredibly valuable, and I'm grateful for your help in navigating this process.

Thank you again for your time and support. I wish you all the best, and I hope our paths will cross again in the future!
